name: Apocalypse Angel
description:
Made for metroidvania month 10

Scenario: 

A colony ship floats through space searching for an earth-like exoplanet until they discover something interesting to investigate.

You found heaven.  A bright, cloudy place in the middle of no where.
There are angels there welcoming you until they read your mind and find out you worship the wrong God so they turn on you, possessing the machinery in the ship.

Controls: (which are in game anyway)

move/aim: arrows/dpad

jump: Z or A(controller)

attack: X

grapple: shift /right bumper

restart room: R / left trigger

fullscreen: alt+enter
